channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M42
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M42

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 southbound between J10 and J9 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M42 southbound between junctions J10 and J9, minor delays are possible due to barrier repairs closing one lane. Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 northbound between J9 and J10 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M42 northbound between junctions J9 and J10, minor delays are possible due to barrier repairs closing one lane. Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 northbound between J10 and J11 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M42 northbound between junctions J10 and J11, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 J6 southbound access | Southbound | Entertainment Event
item.description: On the M42 southbound entry slip at junction J6 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to an entertainment event , from 10:30 pm on 6 October 2011 to 11:59 pm on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 J6 northbound access | Northbound | Entertainment Event
item.description: On the M42 northbound entry slip at junction J6 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to an entertainment event , from 10:30 pm on 6 October 2011 to 11:59 pm on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 J6 southbound exit | Southbound | Entertainment Event
item.description: On the M42 southbound exit slip at junction J6 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to an entertainment event , from 6 pm on 6 October 2011 to 7:30 pm on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 J6 northbound exit for N.E.C. and A45 eastbound | Northbound | Entertainment Event
item.description: On the M42 northbound exit slip at junction J6 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to an entertainment event , from 6 pm on 6 October 2011 to 7:30 pm on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 northbound between J1 and J2 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M42 northbound between the M5 and J2, expect delays of up to 30 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 9:30 pm on 5 October 2011 to 5 am on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road from M5 J4A southbound to M42 northbound | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M42 northbound entry slip at junction J4A from M5 South will be closed due to roadworks, from 9:30 pm on 5 October 2011 to 5 am on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road from M5 J4A northbound to M42 northbound | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M42 northbound entry slip at junction J4A from M5 North will be closed due to roadworks, from 9:30 pm on 5 October 2011 to 5 am on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M42 J1 northbound access | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M42 northbound entry slip at junction J1 will be closed due to roadworks, from 9:30 pm on 5 October 2011 to 5 am on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road between M42 J7A northbound and the M6 J4 southbound | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M42 northbound exit slip at junction J7A will be closed due to roadworks, between 9:30 pm and 5:30 am, from 3 October 2011 to 13 October 2011.
